description:
Track and evaluate the performance of your investment portfolio across stocks, cryptocurrencies, and other assets.


- New: Added Binance USDS-M Futures as an online price feed.
- New: Added an option to disable automatic price downloads in the “Search for suppliers of historical prices” dialog.
- Improvement: The generic JSON importer can now be configured with a locale for parsing dates in a specific language.
- Improvement: Migrated extended ECB feeds (e.g. Euribor and others) to the new ECB Data Portal endpoint.
- Improvement: Improved PDF importers for Baader Bank, DKB, Bourse Direct, Raiffeisenbank Bankgruppe, Advanzia Bank, Saxo Bank, Sutor Bank, sbroker, Sparkasse, MERKUR PRIVATBANK, Scalable Capital, and Tradegate AG.
- Fix: Improved handling of PDF parsing errors to prevent crashes.
